## Transforming point data to a sf object

We are from Rome and Tianjin. Let's see where these are on a map 

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
# This code finds the coordinate of Berlin 


cities <- data.frame(
  place = c("Rome", "Tianjin"),
  long = c(12.496366, 117.190182),
  lat = c(41.902782, 39.084158),
  value = c(500, 600))
class(d)


cities_dsf <- st_as_sf(d, coords = c("long", "lat"))
st_crs(dsf) <- 4326
class(dsf)

mapview(dsf)

```
